sets.detail:
200 Melee Attack is to hit as hard as possible 
 200 Speed with Nimble outspeeds Very Nimble Revenine and below 
 52 Energy = 305 Energy at level 50 for (1 Bulk Up + 5 Primal Slashes) with Power Cuffs 
 52 Energy = 305 Energy at level 50 for (4 Thistle Slashes + 3 Primal Slashes + 1 Bulk Up) without Power Cuffs 
 48 HP is leftovers
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer
